features: BABY TOOTH AND GUM WIPES. Help keep baby’s mouth clean without brushing! Easily and quickly wipe baby’s gums and teeth after feeding to help protect against bottle mouth and establish a healthy dental care routine.
BABY NOSE AND FACE WIPES. Gently clean and moisturize baby’s nose and face with Dr. Brown’s Nose and Face Wipes.
PACIFIER AND BOTTLE WIPES. Dr. Brown’s Pacifier & Bottle Wipes safely and naturally clean baby’s bottles, pacifiers, teethers, toys and more.
HYPOALLERGENIC CLEANING WIPES. Dr. Brown’s wipes are hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested.
Variety Pack includes: 1x 30-pack Nose and Face Wipes, 1x 30-pack Tooth and Gum Wipes, 1x 40-pack Pacifier and Bottle Wipes.
body.description: Good oral hygiene starts with a wipe! Dr. Brown’s Tooth and Gum Wipes keep baby’s mouth clean without brushing. Before baby’s teeth fully emerge, their gums can be sore from erupting teeth. You can gently and easily remove plaque and build-up with the naturally-derived Tooth and Gum Wipes from Dr. Brown’s. These safe mouth wipes are fluoride-, alcohol-, and paraben-free, using all-natural, plant-based Xylitol to clean sensitive gums. Easily and quickly wipe baby’s gums and teeth after feeding to help protect against bottle mouth and establish a health dental care routine that lasts a lifetime. Clean with the swipe of a wipe! Dr. Brown’s Pacifier and Bottle Wipes are the perfect portable solution to safely and naturally clean pacifiers, bottles, teethers, cups, toys, feeding spoons and more. Your baby puts everything in their mouth – then spits it right out. Using all-natural, plant-based xylitol and fruit extract, a swipe of a Dr. Brown’s Pacifier and Bottle Wipe cleans it right up. Wipe away saliva, dirt, dust, and other travelers while you’re at home or out and about. No alcohol, SLS, formaldehyde, parabens or fragrance. Just naturally derived ingredients safe for ingestion. You don’t even have to rinse off the wipe residue! Plus, the xylitol in the Pacifier and Bottle Wipes help maintain good oral health. Dr. Brown’s Pacifier and Bottle Wipes. Dr. Brown’s™ Nose and Face Wipes help soothe sore, stuffy little noses with the gentle touch of calendula. Made with plant-based xylitol, a naturally occurring compound that is known to soothe and clear skin, the wipes gently clean and moisturize baby’s nose and face. While dry tissues can be harsh or painful, Dr. Brown’s™ Nose and Face Wipes easily wipe away food and mucus. The 30-wipe pack is travel-friendly, sized just right for a diaper bag, backpack or purse. Made without alcohol, parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, sulfates, dyes or fragrance. Dr. Brown’s™ Nose and Face Wipes are dermatologist-tested and contain naturally-derived ingredients for sensitive skin. Not tested on animals. Keep away from dogs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these and these are perfect to add to the diaper bag! I use these mainly on the go but I always have them near by!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby tested, baby approved
reviews.reviewText: These are a common household, baby cleaning, item. We have them in our diaper bag and everywhere else scattered around the house. Worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great variety set to try out the different wipes.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of wipes so you can try them out to see what wipes you like. The nose and face wipes were very helpful when our toddler had a runny nose, as well as helpful in cleaning his face in the morning from drool overnight.We use the tooth and gum wipes for our youngest in cleaning his gums. It cleans well enough and the scent smells fine without being too overwhelming.We keep the pacifier and bottle wipes in the diaper bag as it’s most helpful if they drop the pacifier when we’re out and about. Also great for a quick clean of the pacifier while at home.All the packs are compact to be used on the go if needed, but you’ll use some more than others based on the situation. They are great quality as expected from Dr. Brown’s products. Overall, I would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good wipes but is the variety necessary?
reviews.reviewText: The wipes are pretty decent. The scented ones are lightly scented so nothing too overpowering and Dr. Brown's is a trusted name so the wipes are relatively chemical free with naturally derived ingredients. I appreciate that they are great for sensitive skin as well.Now, the wipes feel like wipes, its rather interesting that they are split up into specific uses. I feel they're the same wipes, just packaged and marketed different for various uses. Seems a bit overboard and unnecessary. Nevertheless, I've been using the pacifier wipes as table wipes and hand wipes since the little one doesn't use bottles or pacifiers anymore. I did find the most usage in the nose and face wipes. Its great to use especially now during colder weather when the little guy has dribbles down the nose. The packaging is small and convenient to take out on the go and throwing in the diaper bag.Decent product but I do wish they sell them single pack because for older toddlers, the pacifier and bottle wipes doesn't seem that useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are pretty good. I'm not a big fan of the variety pack, I'd rather just have face wipes for everything. The scent is ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent set of wipes for the bag
reviews.reviewText: this is the perfect set of different to go wipes for all different use cases that keeps your little one rotected and feeling comfortable at all times

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect starter set for a baby shower basket
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of wipes. The face wipes contain calendula which is super helpful with baby and toddler's sensitive skin. The tooth wipes are super helpful when littles are cutting their first teeth and need to begin getting used to brushing their teeth. The pacifer and bottle(or cup) wipes are great when you've got a little one that likes to throw things on the ground or drops things a ton. The face wipes and teeth wipes are only a 30 pack, not a 40 pack like the pacifer and bottle wipes.NOTE: Xylitol, the natural cleaning agent in the teeth wipes and pacifier and bottle wipes is HIGHLY toxic to dogs. It's has many great benefits and uses for humans but per the VCA: xylitol is extremely toxic to dogs. Even small amounts of xylitol can cause hypoglycemia (low blood sugar), seizures, liver failure, or even death in dogs. If you have a dog that gets into trash or likes to chew things, especially since the teeth wipes are grape flavor, you may want to avoid using in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set and the tooth and gum wipes are our favorite
reviews.reviewText: I love the variety of this set as I use all three. The pacifier and bottle wipes are great to keep in our diaper bag when we are out. Especially for dropped pacifiers, which happens quite a bit. The nose and face wipes work well, especially when my daughter wakes up with a dried drool after a good night's sleep. But my favorite of the wipes are the tooth and gum wipes - and my daughter's as well! I was using a different brand of these and those haven't been available for purchase for a while. So I was happy to see these. She seems to like these even more than the other brand. We brush her teeth daily, but she will always ask for one especially when she is teething, which seems to calm her a bit. I noticed that you can purchase these on Amazon individually, which I plan to do once we run out. Great value set!
